title: Profile of Evil
description: Carly Stone is a brilliant FBI agent who’s seen more than her share of evil. Leaving the agency, she becomes a consultant for Indiana County Sheriff Brody Chase. He needs her help to catch a savage killer who is luring teenaged girls to their death in the handsome sheriff’s community.The two are determined to stop a dangerous predator before he takes another life — at any cost.
author: Alexa Grace
